channel.title: Hello, I'm Milan from Blue Bytes
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm Milan, founder of [Blue Bytes][1]. I'm living in the Netherlands. After gaining experience, in 2009 I started Blue Bytes. At Blue Bytes we're building websites, apps and we're doing marketing. The most of our websites (and app-backends) we're building in PHP with Laravel 4. I really like to be on this forum!
[1]: http://bluebytes.nl

item.title: Hello, I'm Milan from Blue Bytes
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
Hi Milan. Welcome to the forums!

Read full topic
item.source: Hello, I'm Milan from Blue Bytes
